committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend for 2 years the authorization for the striking of medals in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the cable car in San Francisco.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Extends for two years (until December 31, 1976) the authorization for the striking of medals in commemoration of the one hundredth anniversary of the cable car in San Francisco. Extends for 3 months (until March 31, 1975) the authorization for the striking of medals commemorating the International Exposition on Environment in Spokane, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 2 years the authorization for the striking of medals in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the cable car in San Francisco.
